meanings.definition: A relationship between states where one has control over the foreign relations of the other.
meanings.sent1: The suzerainty of the larger country over the smaller one was evident in their diplomatic affairs.
meanings.sent2: The suzerainty of the king over the neighboring tribes was unquestioned.
meanings.sent3: The suzerainty of the penguin over the seals in the zoo led to some comical interactions.
meanings.sent4: Her suzerainty over the office coffee machine made her the unofficial caffeine queen.
meanings.sent5: The suzerainty of the teacher over the classroom was maintained through clear rules and expectations.

meanings.definition: The position or authority of a suzerain.
meanings.sent1: The emperor's suzerainty extended over vast territories, showing his power.
meanings.sent2: The suzerainty of the landlord was evident in the strict rental agreements.
meanings.sent3: The cat's suzerainty over the house was challenged when a new puppy arrived.
meanings.sent4: His suzerainty in the company was akin to being the captain of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The suzerainty of the mayor over the town was marked by his decisions and policies.
